class_notes: Major topics include evolutionary biology and the physiology of animals and plants in an evolutionary and ecological context.  This course will fulfill the Column B (or elective) requirement for the Biology major.  Prerequisite:  Biology 141.  Students with AP credit for Biology 141 may enroll in Biology 240 prior to (or at the same time) taking Biology 142 + 142L.
course_description: Major topics include the biology of animals and plants, physiology, evolution, and ecology.
prerequisites: This course requires BIOL 141, and BIOL 141L or BIOL 151or BIOL_OX141 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
